actions.text: Amendment SA 4577 ruled out of order by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 4577.
Amendment SA 4577 proposed by Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 4556. (consideration: CR S7326-7327; text: CR S7326-7327) To provide for immigration injunction reform.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4577 proposed by Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 4556.

amends_amendment.purpose: To amend chapter 27 of title 18, United States Code, to prohibit the unauthorized construction, financing, or, with reckless disregard, permitting the construction or use on one's land, of a tunnel or subterranean passageway between the United States and another country and to direct the United States Sentencing Commission to modify the sentencing guidelines to account for such prohibition.

purpose: To provide for immigration injunction reform.
